account.bittrex_scam: This account is not the real Bittrex account, please send to this account: bittrex-deposit.

confirm_asset_modal.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to save all changes to these tabs?

account.deposit_address: Your deposit address is your account name

errors.memo_missing: You do not have control of the memo key for this account. In order to use a memo, please set the account memo key to a key you control using the Permissions page.
errors.not_found: %(name)s 계정은 존재하지 않습니다. 철자를 정확히 입력하셨습니까?

account.in_open: This is the amount of %(asset)s you have in open orders.
account.in_open_value: This is the estimated value of the %(asset)s you have in open orders.
account.intro_text_2: The DEX is inherently decentralized, enabling you to trade the LocalCoin core token (LLC) and a range of trustless price-stable, market-pegged assets such as USD, CNY, EUR, Gold and more. These assets can all be traded with zero counter-party risk, putting you in total control of your funds.
account.intro_text_3: The DEX also enables creation of user-issued assets (UIAs), which can be traded against any other UIAs or trustless assets on the platform. One well-known issuer on The DEX is OpenLedger, offering a host of assets including BTC, ETH, STEEM, DASH, LTC, DOGE, and many more
account.intro_text_4: This gives cryptocurrency traders a unique blend of traditional and decentralized trading, all in a familiar exchange interface. Happy trading!

member.referral_text: Give this to link to people you want to refer to LocalCoin

account.name: 계정명

name_input.premium_name_faucet: This is a premium name. Premium names are more expensive and can't be registered for free by faucet. Try to select another name containing at least one dash, number or no vowels.
name_input.premium_name_warning: This is a premium name that is more expensive to register. Regular names have at least one dash, number or no vowels.

optional.formatter: Optionally, {restore_link} or create an account using the {restore_form}.

account.other_scam: This account is not known to be an official account, please verify the destination before transferring

perm.memo_warning: WARNING: If you replace the memo key you will be unable to read old memos when logging in with your password, and unless you import the new memo private key into your old wallet that wallet will be unable to decode new memos
perm.password_model_1: If you want to be able to login from anywhere using only your password, you can use this page to add new keys to your permissions. If you also want to remove the original keys, you can do so in the active/owner permissions tabs.
perm.warning1: Active permissions weights total of %(weights_total)s should be equal or exceed threshold of %(threshold)s
perm.warning2: Owner permissions weights total of %(weights_total)s should be equal or exceed threshold of %(threshold)s
perm.warning3: Account is already in the list
perm.warning4: Key is already in the list

account.polo_scam: This account is not the real Poloniex account, please send to this account: poloniexwallet.

signedmessages.automaticcreation: Signed message will be created automatically
signedmessages.errorverifying: An error occured while verifying the message
signedmessages.invalidformat: Signed message format can't be recognized

signedmessages.invalidsignature: The content of the message could not be validated against the signature

account.total_estimate: This is the estimated value of all your assets, including any hidden assets, open orders, debt and collateral. The estimate is done using only live blockchain data and may not be perfectly accurate.

user_issued_assets.cer_warning_2: Make sure your core exchange rate is higher than the market price, otherwise people will buy your token from the market and drain your fee pool via implicit arbitrage. The core exchange rate should be updated regularly to reflect market pricing of your asset.
user_issued_assets.committee_fed_asset: Allow committee members to provide feeds
user_issued_assets.conflict_feed: Cannot allow witnesses and committee members to provide feeds simultaneously
user_issued_assets.error_invalid: That asset may not be used
user_issued_assets.error_precision: That asset does not have the same precision as %(asset)s
user_issued_assets.feed_not_allowed_1: Cannot set feed producers on a witness- or committee-fed asset
user_issued_assets.feed_not_allowed_2: Please disable the flags called 'Allow witnesses to provide feeds' and 'Allow committee members to provide feeds' in order to allow manual definition of feed producers
user_issued_assets.global_settle: Allow issuer to force a global settling
user_issued_assets.invalid_market_pair: Preferred market pairing can not be the same market
user_issued_assets.max_positive: Max supply should be a positive number
user_issued_assets.maximum_force_settlement_volume: Max force settle volume (percent of total supply per hour)
user_issued_assets.name: 자산 이름
user_issued_assets.need_asset: At least one of the two assets must be %(name)s
user_issued_assets.override_authority: Issuer may transfer asset back to himself
user_issued_assets.perm_warning: WARNING: Permissions may only be disabled, once disabled they may not be reactivated!!
user_issued_assets.precision_warning: Warning: The number of decimals may not be changed after creation
user_issued_assets.too_large: That max supply is too big, please choose a smaller number
user_issued_assets.too_many_feed: Number of feed producers exceeded the max allowed (%(max)s).
user_issued_assets.visible: Hide asset from search and markets

vesting.explain: Vesting balances contain any fees earned through the referral program or from worker pay, for example. They have a certain vesting period and are continually unlocked during that vesting period until all of the balances are available
vesting.no_balances: This account has no vesting balances
vesting.title: Vesting balances

votes.already: Account is already in the list
votes.creator: Creator
votes.name: 이름
votes.proxy_known: Or choose an account as your proxy

errors.below: Your collateral ratio is below %(mr)s which is not allowed.
errors.close: Your collateral ratio is close to %(mr)s which means this position is in danger of being margin called if the price drops.

borrow.maximize_debt_set_ratio_slider: You must set a collateral ratio before being able to maximize debt
borrow.title: Collateral position for %(asset_symbol)s

exchange.checking_for_worth_less_settlement: Checking if you can get a better price by selling to market, please wait..
exchange.confirm_buy: Your order is %(diff)s times higher than the lowest ask, are you sure?
exchange.confirm_no_orders_buy: You are placing a buy order in a market with no open sell orders. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
exchange.confirm_no_orders_sell: You are placing a sell order in a market with no open buy orders. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
exchange.confirm_sell: Your order is %(diff)s times lower than the highest bid, are you sure?
exchange.market_frozen: The owner of %(asset)s has disabled trading in this market.
exchange.worth_less_settlement_warning: Warning! You can get a better price by selling to {market_link}.

fee_pool.claim_text: The asset issuer may claim any accumulated fees here.
fee_pool.fund_text: The fee pool is used to pay fees in %(core)s by converting the fee in %(asset)s to %(core)s. If the fee pool runs out of funds, fees may no longer be paid in %(asset)s and will default to %(core)s
fee_pool.title: Fee Pool

whitelist.enable_flag: The whitelist flag must be enabled in order to set whitelist authorities

proposals.authority_depth_warning: This proposal may not get approved because this permission exceeds the maximum authority depth.
proposals.children_authority_depth_warning: This proposal may not get approved because a permission exceeds the maximum authority depth.
proposals.title: 제안서

workers.create_text_1: In order to create your new worker, please fill in the form below. The worker will be created using your currently active account, which must already be a lifetime member.
workers.create_text_2: Consider carefully the parameters you choose as they can not be changed once you've published your worker.
workers.date_text: The start date should be at least a week into the future in order to allow people the time to discover, evaluate and vote for your worker.
workers.name_text: The name of your worker should be short and descriptive, something like this: 'Worker Purpose - Account Name'
workers.pay_text: The daily pay defines how much you want to be paid per day and is defined in LLC. The current best practice is to define a salary in USD/CNY, and commit to burning whatever surplus you receive as a result of the LLC price increasing. As long as your worker is active and has sufficient votes to be above the refund worker, you will receive this daily salary.
workers.title: 예산 항목
workers.url_text: You should supply a website, github document or google doc that describes in more detail the purpose of the worker and how you intend to use the worker pay.
workers.vesting_text: The vesting period defines the number of days that worker earnings will vest before being fully claimable.

footer.nosync: Your active node is out of sync
footer.title: 로컬코인 2.0

assets.bit: bit%(asset)s is a derivative that tracks the real value of %(backed)s. It is 100%% decentralized, trustless and backed by collateral held by the blockchain in a smart contract.
assets.bitcny: bitCNY can be deposited or withdrawn 1:1 to real Yuan using a gateway service such as Magic Wallet. For more info, see https://www.magicw.net/
assets.open: The %(asset)s asset is backed 1:1 by real %(backed)s and can be deposited or withdrawn using the gateway service provided by Openledger.
assets.trade: The %(asset)s asset is backed 1:1 by real %(backed)s and can be deposited or withdrawn using the gateway service provided by Blocktrades.

gateway.bridge_text: A bridge lets you exchange an asset into another one, for example BTC to LLC.
gateway.choose_deposit: Please select the coin you would like to deposit
gateway.choose_withdraw: Please select the coin you would like to withdraw
gateway.deposit_notice_delay: (new address can be generated once per 5 minutes)
gateway.deposit_warning: Sending any other currency to the %(asset)s address will result in the loss of your deposit
gateway.deposit_warning_memo: Deposit %(asset)s must contains memo, otherwise it won't be credited
gateway.fiat_text: Note: Fiat gateways are closed till further notice. Sorry for the inconvenience! Please follow our latest news and updates here blog.openledger.info
gateway.gateway_text: Choose whether you want to make a deposit or withdrawal here
gateway.min_count_confirmations: Wait for %(cnt)s confirmations for balance funding
gateway.min_deposit_warning_asset: IMPORTANT: Send only %(coin)s to this deposit address. Sending less than %(minDeposit)s %(coin)s or any other currency to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.
gateway.purchase_1: Quickly and easily purchase %(outputAsset)s using %(inputAsset)s from an external wallet. This service is provided by Blocktrades
gateway.purchase_notice: %(inputAsset)s sent to this address will show up as %(outputAsset)s
gateway.purchase_notice_memo: Memo required for proper routing to your account

locked.action: Click to unlock your account to perform this action

icons.thumb_tack: Pin panel to the left side

incognito.warning: If you close your browser without backing up your wallet, you will lose this account permanently.

init_error.browser_text: The Browser you are using has not been fully tested to support the LocalCoin Wallet. We highly recommend that you backup your local wallet and import it using the Chrome Browser until we have had more time to fully test your browser of choice. Use at your own risk.
init_error.title: Application initialization issues

migration.announcement_1: In an effort to provide enhanced security for the web-based wallet, we are migrating it, effective immediately to the address below. Please be sure to update any bookmarks you may have.
migration.text_2: Please backup your wallet now and restore the backup file to https://wallet.LocalCoin.is, which will be your new address for the web wallet. Thanks for your continued support.
migration.text_3: Please use https://wallet.LocalCoin.is from now on, your existing credentials will let you login there as well.
migration.title: Notice

confirmation.title: The address you entered does not appear valid, are you sure you want to make the withdrawal?

deposit.bts_transfer_description: It's easy to receive LLC from anywhere. As long as LLC is sent to your account name it will show up in your wallet. This QR code also contains your account name.

An empty password will show an unencrypted QR code.

operation.limit_order_sell: {account} placed an order to sell {amount} at {price}

proposal.limit_order_buy: Place an order to buy {amount} at {price} for {account}
proposal.limit_order_create: Place order to buy %(buy_amount)s for %(sell_amount)s for %(account)s

settings.backup_favorites: Restore favorites using a json file

settings.faucet_address_text: The faucet address is used to pay the registration fee for new users.
settings.lookup_text: Click the button below to check for unclaimed balances from LLC 1.0
settings.no_accounts: This local wallet does not contain any accounts.
settings.node_already_exists: Node with such URL already exists
settings.reset_text: Restore settings to their original defaults.
settings.reset_text_description: This will reset all your %(generalName)s, %(accessName)s and %(faucetName)s Settings
settings.restore_brainkey_text: In order to restore from a brainkey, you will need to create a new local wallet. Please provide a password and name for your new local wallet below, then enter your brainkey.
settings.restore_text: Restore from a backup or import keys.
settings.showAssetPercent: Show asset percentages on the account page
settings.showSettles: Show settle orders in depth chart
settings.valid_node_url: Node URL must begin with ws:// or wss://
settings.wallet_required_text: In order to restore a backup you will need to switch to the wallet model first, do so by clicking the button below
settings.wallet_text: Control the details of your local wallet.

sync_fail.sub_text_1: Please verify that your computer clock is correct.
sync_fail.sub_text_2:
Once you've synchronized your clock, please refresh this page.

If your clock is already correct, the API server you're using could be out of sync. In that case, please try a different server from the list below.
sync_fail.title: Failed to sync with the API server

tooltip.borrow: Borrow %(asset)s from the network. This creates a smart contract that locks your collateral until you either modify the position or a margin call is required.
tooltip.bridge_TRADE: BlockTrades is a bridge which supports instant trade of assets. Details and terms can be found on https://blocktrades.us
tooltip.buy_min: You will receive at minimum this amount. If there are matching orders with a cheaper price than you specified, you will receive more than this amount.
tooltip.call_limit: This is the call price of the least collateralized margin position in the market.
tooltip.call_price: This is the call price of the position. If the feed price goes below the call price, the position will be margin called.
tooltip.close_position: Click here to close your position. You will need to have at least %(amount)s %(asset)s in order to do so.
tooltip.coll_ratio: The collateral ratio of the position is COLLATERAL * FEED PRICE / DEBT.
tooltip.copy_password: Click here to copy the password to your clipboard
tooltip.copy_tip: Click here to copy the text to your clipboard
tooltip.cr_danger: This position is currently being margin called. Consider adding collateral to bring the collateral ratio above %(mr)s or closing the position.
tooltip.cr_warning: This position has a low level of collateral, and will get margin called if the collateral ratio drops below %(mr)s. Consider adding collateral or closing the position.
tooltip.deposit_tip: To complete the deposit, go to your external %(asset)s wallet and make a transfer to the address listed on this page. You will receive the deposit as soon as it has been confirmed. If a memo is shown , it is essential that you include this memo in your transfer.
tooltip.disconnected: You are not connected to an API node, try reloading or setting a new access point in the Settings
tooltip.feed_price: This is the current external feed price
tooltip.filter_ops: Use this list to filter your history by operation type.
tooltip.gateway: Gateways back desposits by 100% real assets
tooltip.generate:
The generated password was created by your browser, locally.
No one but you has access to it.
Paste it below and save a copy in a safe place
tooltip.hide_asset: Click here to hide this asset from this list.
tooltip.latest_price: This is the latest price seen in this market.
tooltip.login:
This LocalCoin wallet does not offer a traditional login but instead simply locks or unlocks a wallet that is only stored locally in your browser.

Whenever you close the wallet it will be locked and you will effectively be logged out.
tooltip.margin_price: This is the maximum price that a margin called position can be made to pay. It also called the Squeeze Price.
tooltip.market_fee: The owner of %(asset)s charges a market fee of %(percent)s%% for buy orders. This fee will be subtracted from the amount you receive when your order fills, it is not paid when placing an order.
tooltip.memo_tip: You may include any message in the memo field. Memos are optional but generally required for transfers to exchanges.
tooltip.no_price: There's no recent price available for this asset that can be used to estimate its value.
tooltip.over_limit: The bridge does not have enough of the desired asset for this buy order
tooltip.propose_scam: This proposal was created by a known scammer, do not approve it!
tooltip.propose_tip: Propose another user to initiate a transaction
tooltip.settle: Settling will let you convert your holdings of %(asset)s to LLC after a delay of 24 hours, at a price equal to the feed price at that time.
tooltip.settle_price: This is the price at which settle orders will execute.
tooltip.show_asset: Click here to show this asset in the main list.
tooltip.show_block: Click here to show block #%(block)s where this transaction occured.
tooltip.sign_owner: If you are the owner of this account, please check this to make sure the transaction gets signed properly. This is only necessary if you are using the owner account and that account is not included in the active permissions.
tooltip.sync_no: The current node is out of sync with the blockchain, try switching to another one
tooltip.sync_yes: The current node is in sync with the blockchain
tooltip.transfer_actions: Click here to make a transfer, or to deposit/withdraw those assets that support it.
tooltip.update_position: Click here to update your position. You may at any time change the debt and/or collateral levels of your position.
tooltip.withdraw_address: If you don't already have a %(asset)s address, please find a wallet provider and create one in order to complete the withdrawal.
tooltip.withdraw_full: Click to withdraw the full balance

transaction.asset_claim_fees: claimed asset fees of %(balance_amount)s from %(asset)s fee pool
transaction.csv_tip: Download history as comma separated .csv file

errors.memo_error: The transfer memo parsing error, please try again later.
errors.memo_length_error: The transfer memo length exceed, please check
errors.noFeeBalance: Your balance is insufficient to pay fees using this asset, please choose another asset to pay your fees with
errors.noPoolBalance: That asset has an insufficient fee pool balance to pay the fees with. Please inform the asset owner or select another asset for paying fees.

transfer.header_subheader: Transfers are used for sending funds to other LocalCoin Account Holders
transfer.memo_unlock: Unlock your wallet/account in order to see this memo
transfer.warn_name_unable_read_memo: Proposed sender will be unable to read this memo!

trx_error.expire: Your transaction has expired without being confirmed, please try again later.

walkthrough.buy_orders: 이 시장에 대한 모든 구매 주문을보십시오.
walkthrough.chart_tool_duration: 다른 간격을 사용하여 무역 데이터를 그룹화하십시오.
walkthrough.chart_tool_indicators: 가격 차트에 기술 지표를 추가하여 거래 기회를 파악하십시오.
walkthrough.chart_tool_zoom: 가격 내역을 더 많거나 적게 표시하도록 가격 차트를 조정하십시오.
walkthrough.create_cloud_wallet: 계정 이름과 암호를 사용하여 클라우드 지갑에 액세스하십시오.
walkthrough.create_local_wallet: 로컬 Wallet을 작성하고 로컬 지갑에 속한 개인 키를 다운로드하십시오.
walkthrough.depth_chart: 시장 심층 차트를 사용하여 다른 가격으로 수요와 공급을 표시하십시오.
walkthrough.favourite_button: 시장 목록에서이 쌍을 즐겨 찾기로 표시하십시오.
walkthrough.find_markets_tab: 이 탭을 사용하면 내 시장 탭에 추가 시장을 검색하고 추가 할 수 있습니다.
walkthrough.language_flag: DEX에서 사용할 9 가지 언어 중에서 선택하십시오.
walkthrough.my_markets_tab: 이 탭은 일반적으로 사용되는 시장을 나열합니다.
walkthrough.price_chart: 가격 차트를 사용하여 자산의 가격 조치를 봅니다.
walkthrough.sell_orders: 이 시장에 대한 모든 판매 주문을보십시오.
walkthrough.switch_button: 이 버튼을 사용하여 거래 쌍을 전환하십시오.

wallet.account_create_wallet_text: This password will be used to create a new LocalCoin local wallet for you, which will only be stored locally in your browser. A LocalCoin wallet can contain multiple accounts and can be easily transferred between browsers and computers using a backup file.
wallet.account_exp: This account will be created on the blockchain and will be your address for any transfers you want to make! There are no long Bitcoin-style addresses in LocalCoin!
wallet.backup_explain: Clicking on the button below will generate a backup file with a .bin extension. This file is encrypted with your wallet password, and contains all the private keys for your accounts. It can be used to restore your wallet, or move it to a different computer/browser.
wallet.backup_new_account: Congratulations, you've just created a new account on the LocalCoin blockchain! It is strongly recommended that you make a backup of your wallet now. Without a backup there is no way to restore your account if something happens to your computer.
wallet.backup_warning: It appears that your private key files are not backed up. For security reasons we recommend users do not log in without backing up their private keys.
wallet.brainkey_backed_up: This brainkey was last backed up
wallet.brainkey_not_backed_up: This brainkey has never been backed up
wallet.brainkey_reset_success: Sequence reset. In order to regenerate your private keys from the wallet brain key, refresh your browser then unlock the wallet.
wallet.brainkey_seq_reset_text:
Use this to reset the sequence counter used to derive private keys from the wallet brainkey.
It can be used to force a regeneration of private keys from your wallet brain key.
wallet.brainkey_w1: WARNING: Print this out, or write it down.
wallet.brainkey_w2: Anyone with access to your recovery key will
wallet.brainkey_w3: have access to funds within this wallet.
wallet.bts_rules:
The first rule of LocalCoin is: Do not lose your password.
The second rule of LocalCoin is: Do not lose your password.
The third rule of LocalCoin is: We cannot recover your password.
The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
The seventh rule: Always back up your password.
wallet.change_backup: Now that you've changed your password, we highly recommend making a new backup.
wallet.claim_later: Once you've imported the keys, you can claim these balances to an account of your choosing.
wallet.confirm_error: The confirmation does not match the password
wallet.create_account_password_text: The keys for this new account will be derived using your password. Nothing is stored in the browser or in a central server, so you will need to ensure you remember this password!!
wallet.create_account_text: The account name you choose needs to be unique, as it will be registered publicly on the blockchain and will be your identifer for any transactions you make.
wallet.create_importkeys_text: In order to import keys, you first need to create a local wallet to contain the keys. Complete the dialog below to create a new local wallet.
wallet.create_password: Create a new account using a password
wallet.create_success: Your local wallet has been created
wallet.create_text: The LocalCoin local wallet is stored in your browser, it is not stored in the cloud. A wallet can contain multiple accounts and can be easily transferred between browsers and computers using a backup file.
wallet.create_w_a: Create a local wallet containing an account
wallet.delete_confirm_line2: 예상치 못한 나쁜 일이 벌어질 수 있습니다!
wallet.dont_ask_for_backup: Don't ask me to back up again
wallet.first_account_paid: Since this is your first account, a faucet will pay the registration fee for you.
wallet.has_wallet: When you create your first LocalCoin account, a LocalCoin local wallet will be automatically created as well and stored in your browser. This local wallet is encrypted with your password, and will contain any private keys belonging to your accounts. It is important that you take the time to backup this wallet once created!
wallet.import_backup_choose: Please select your backup file in the dialog below. This is completely safe as the file is not uploaded anywhere and never leaves your browser.
wallet.import_pass_match: Password matches. Decrypting the backup now...
wallet.local_switch: Local wallet detected matching the given password, switching to local wallet mode
wallet.must_be_ltm: The fee paying account must be a lifetime member to perform that operation.
wallet.name: 지갑 이름
wallet.never_backed_up: This Wallet has never been backed up
wallet.no_wallet: You do not have a local wallet yet?
wallet.not_first_account: Since you already have an account, you will need to pay for this new account yourself. In order to do so, your account needs to have lifetime membership, which can be bought in the account page.
wallet.ok_done: OK, take me to the dashboard
wallet.pass_length: The password must contain at least %(minLength)s characters. Ideally you should use 20 or more, and a combination of numbers, special characters and letters.
wallet.password_crucial: It is crucial that you take the time to write down your password now, whether it be on paper, a password manager, or somewhere else. If you lose or forget this password your account will be lost, we cannot help you get it back.
wallet.password_lose_warning: IMPORTANT: If you forget your pass phrase you will be unable to access your account, we cannot reset or restore your password! Make sure you memorize or write down your password!
wallet.password_model_1: The account model uses a password in combination with your account name to generate your private key on the fly.
wallet.password_model_2: This lets you login to your wallet from anywhere using only your account name and password, but it is vulnerable to brute-force attacks which means it is important to use a very long password!
wallet.paste_private: Paste private keys here (Wallet Import Format - WIF)
wallet.tips_explore: Now that you've successfully created an account and downloaded the backup, it's time to get started. Click on one of the links below to start exploring.
wallet.tips_explore_pass: Now that you've successfully created an account and backed up your password, it's time to get started. Click on one of the links on the left to start exploring.
wallet.tips_header: You can also find these same links in the top menu, and in the drop-down menu next to your account name.
wallet.tips_login: IMPORTANT: There is no login/logout functionality here, you merely unlock your wallet when you wish to make a transaction.
wallet.title: 지갑
wallet.understand_1: I understand that no one can recover my password if I lose or forget it
wallet.understand_2: I have written down or otherwise stored my password
wallet.understand_3: I understand that I will lose access to my funds if I lose my password
wallet.wallet_browser: Your Web Browser is your Wallet
wallet.wallet_crucial: Your local wallet is only stored in your browser, so it is crucial that you create a backup that will enable you to recover your wallet if the data in your browser is lost! No one else can restore your account if you lose your backup.
wallet.wallet_exist: 지갑이 이미 존재합니다. 새로운 이름을 선택하세요
wallet.wallet_exist_with_name: (%(name)s) 지갑이 이미 존재합니다. 다른 이름을 선택하세요
wallet.wallet_lose_warning: IMPORTANT: If you lose your local wallet or your pass phrase you will be unable to access any of your funds again. Make sure you store the backup somewhere safe, and memorize or write down your password!
wallet.wallet_model_1: The wallet model stores the wallet in your browser. It is encrypted with a password that you choose, and can be backed up using either a brainkey or an encrypted binary file that contains all the private keys.
wallet.wallet_model_2: The wallet model has the best security, but is restricted to your current browser and computer. To migrate the wallet to another browser or computer, you may use the backup file or brainkey.
wallet.wallet_move: This backup file can also be used to move your local wallet to different computers or different browsers. In order to restore your local wallet using this backup you will also need your password!

gateway.deposit_warning: Do not deposit non-%(asset)s assets into %(asset)s address, otherwise they will not be recovered
gateway.support_block: For support, please contact Winex at:
